name: Beat Pix (Dehodrak)
description:
Beat Pix is a side-View  2D Tower-Defense/platformer where you'll have to shoot alien to earn beats and build musical turrets to help you defend the music from the aliens. 

I created it with unity in my first year of Game design studies.

we had to create a game around one given music,in groups of 7 (by the way Kaldrin was in my group and he has a itch.io too )

The music is not from us, credits to Yacht Club Games and all remixes we found on Youtube 

Concept

This is a tower defense game where you have to protect music ! Aliens invade our world to steal our new source of energy : the Beats, and you're one of the last hopes to destroy them !

Build turrets unleashing musical power, build your melody across the level, get beats and defend your base !

Turrets need a certain amount of beats to be built, and you can place them on the corresponding emplacements !

Commands

- Left click : Shoot / Place turret

- E : Melee attack

- Mouse : Aim

- Scroll : 

- QD : Move

- Space : Jump

- F : Trigger new wave

Bugs

- You have to press F to trigger a new wave
